milestones.title: MVP (30 days)
milestones.description: Canvas prototype, data model, basic security hardening

issues.title: [P0] Harden secrets & sensitive data handling
issues.body:
Epic: Security, Compliance & Privacy

Owner: Security lead

Acceptance: No plaintext secrets in repo; secrets detection CI job; critical secrets rotated.

Tasks:
- Run repo secrets scan (git-secrets / trufflehog)
- Add secrets detection job to CI
- Remove or rotate any exposed secrets

issues.title: [P0] Enable auth/RBAC and production-ready config
issues.body:
Epic: Core Platform & Architecture

Owner: Platform

Acceptance: API protected by token-based auth; config from env and validated; fail-safe defaults.

Tasks:
- Add token-based auth middleware to API
- Move secrets/config to env and validate on startup
- Document secure defaults and deployment checklist

issues.title: [P0] CI/CD gating + reproducible builds
issues.body:
Epic: DevOps / CI/CD

Owner: DevOps

Acceptance: PRs blocked on tests; artifacts versioned; rollback strategy documented.

Tasks:
- Enforce PR checks for tests
- Version and store build artifacts
- Add rollback instructions to deployment docs

issues.title: [P1] Implement Investigation Canvas UI Prototype
issues.body:
Epic: RCA Workflow & UX

Owner: Frontend/Product

Acceptance: Clickable prototype; two pilot engineers validate flow.

issues.title: [P1] Build Investigations Data Model & API
issues.body:
Epic: Data & Integrations

Owner: Backend

Acceptance: Read/write investigations; link events; unit tests cover model and endpoints.

issues.title: [P1] Security red-team & threat model verification
issues.body:
Epic: Security, Compliance & Privacy

Owner: Security

Acceptance: Threat model validated; high-risk issues remedied or triaged.

issues.title: [P2] Observability hookup: tracing, metrics, dashboards
issues.body:
Epic: Observability, Telemetry & Analytics

Owner: SRE

Acceptance: Traces for requests; basic dashboards + alert for error rate.

issues.title: [P1] Persist notification preferences to durable store
issues.body:
Epic: Core Platform & Architecture

Owner: Backend

Acceptance: Notification preferences migrated from in-memory to DB; unsubscribe tokens persisted; unit tests added.

issues.title: [P0] Remove committed virtualenv and sanitize docs placeholders
issues.body:
Epic: Security, Compliance & Privacy

Owner: Repo Admin

Acceptance: `.venv/` removed from repo, `.gitignore` updated, example secrets in docs replaced with REDACTED markers, and PRs include a check preventing .venv commits.
